hollow.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a hollow sound is low and clear like the sound made when you hit something empty
hollow.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: There was a hollow thump as the cars collided.
hollow.translation[0].definitions[2].def: words, events, or people that are hollow have no real worth or value
hollow.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: They won, but it was a hollow victory.
Even as he spoke, Ivan was well aware of the hollow ring to his words.
hollow.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a place in something that is at a slightly lower level than its surface
hollow.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Make a slight hollow in the middle of each cake.
hollow.translation[2].definitions[0].def: to make the surface of something curve inwards
hollow.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: The steps were hollowed by centuries of use.
